# Repository Mirror Notice

‚ö†Ô∏è **This repository is no longer the primary source of development.**

The project has been migrated from GitHub to **Codeberg**.  
This GitHub repository exists **only as a push mirror** and is automatically synchronized from the Codeberg repository.

## What this means

- ‚ùå **No issues, pull requests, or discussions are tracked here**
- ‚ùå **Direct contributions on GitHub will be ignored**
- ‚úÖ **All development happens on Codeberg**

## New canonical repository

üëâ **Codeberg (authoritative source):**  
https://codeberg.org/sinky/html5-screensaver-node-webkit

Please update your bookmarks, remotes, and CI references accordingly.

## For contributors

If you want to report bugs, request features, or submit patches, do so **exclusively on Codeberg**.

Thank you for understanding.
